#summary &lt character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesL

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &lt

== Value ==

There are 5 variations of this entity:

  * `&LT;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003c/index.htm U+0003C].
  * `&LT` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003c/index.htm U+0003C].
  * `&Lt;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/226a/index.htm U+0226A].
  * `&lt;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003c/index.htm U+0003C].
  * `&lt` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003c/index.htm U+0003C].
